item.title: Ilana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "People have to talk about something just to keep their voice boxes in working order so they'll have good voice boxes in case there's ever anything really meaningful to say." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "We are what we pretend to be, so we must be careful about what we pretend to be." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Disbelief is more resistant than faith because it is sustained by the senses." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "No medicine cures what happiness cannot." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: " Loneliness is the human condition. Cultivate it. The way it tunnels into you allows your soul room to grow. Never expect to outgrow loneliness. Never hope to find people who will understand you, someone to fill that space. An intelligent, sensitive person is the exception, the very great exception. If you expect to find people who will understand you, you will grow murderous with disappointment. The best you'll ever do is to understand yourself, know what it is that you want, and not let the cattle stand in your way." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Ayn Rand
item.description: "She knew that even pain can be confessed, but to confess happiness is to stand naked, delivered to the witness..." -- Ayn Rand

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "There may be times when we are powerless to prevent injustice, but there must never be a time when we fail to protest." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Anne Frank
item.description: "How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." -- Anne Frank

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "I object to violence because when it appears to do good, the good is only temporary; the evil it does is permanent." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Truth never damages a cause that is just." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Flavia Weedn
item.description: "Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some people move our souls to dance. They awaken us to a new understanding with the passing whisper of their wisdom. Some people make the sky more beautiful to gaze upon. They stay in our lives for awhile, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same." -- Flavia Weedn

item.title: Ilana add a quote by Flavia Weedn
item.description: "If one dream should fall and break into a thousand pieces, never be afraid to pick one of those pieces up and begin again." -- Flavia Weedn
